ARABIC: أَمْ لَهُمْ نَصِيبٌ مِّنَ ٱلْمُلْكِ فَإِذًا لَّا يُؤْتُونَ ٱلنَّاسَ نَقِيرًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Or do they indeed really own a portion of Allah's kingdom? In that case they do not give so much as a scrap to other people!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Have they a share in the kingdom? (If they had,) they would never have given an iota to the people.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Have they any share in the dominion (of Allah)? Had that been so, they would never have granted people even as much as the speck on a date-stone.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Even if they had a share in the Kingdom (Divine authority), they would not have given the smallest thing to anyone.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Do they have some share in the kingship?- if it were, they would not give to mankind even a single sesame.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Or have they a share in the dominion Then in that case they would not give mankind even a Naqir.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Or have they a share in the kingdom? But then they would not give to people even the speck in the date stone.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Or have they a share in the Kingdom? If that is so, they do not give the people a single date-spot.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Or have they even a share in the Sovereignty? Then in that case, they would not give mankind even the speck on a date-stone.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Have they a share in God's kingdom? If they did, they would not give others so much as the groove of a date stone.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Is theirs a portion of the dominion? In that case, they would not give the people a speck.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Do they have a share in sovereignty? If so, they will not give those people [so much as] a speck on a date-stone!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Have they a share in dominion or power? Behold, they give not a farthing to their fellow-men?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Or have they a share in the dominion? Then in that case they would not give mankind even a Naqira (speck on the back of a date-stone).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Or, will they have a share in the Kingdom? If so, they will not give the people the pit mark of a date stone.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Or do they own a share of the kingdom? Then they would not give people a speck.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Or have they a share of dominion? Then [if that were so], they would not give the people [even as much as] the speck on a date seed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [4:53] Or have they a share in the Kingdom?, that is to say, they have no share in it whatever, and even if they did, then they would not give the people a single date-spot, that is, [not even] something as worthless as   the tiny spot on the back of a date-pit, because of the extent of their niggardliness.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Or have they even a share) if the Jews had a share (in the Sovereignty? Then in that case, they would not give mankind) they would not give Muhammad and his Companions (even the speck on a date stone).
